name: Aragorn
text:
Sentinel.
Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.
flavor: `I am Aragorn son of Arathorn; and if by life or death I can save you, I will.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Theodred
text: Response: After Théodred commits to a quest, choose a hero committed to that quest. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.
flavor:
`Not all is dark. Take courage, Lord of the Mark...`

-Gandalf, The Two Towers

name: Gloin
text: Response: After Glóin suffers damage, add 1 resource to his resource pool for each point of damage he just suffered.

name: Gimli
text: Gimli gets +1 Attack for each damage token on him.
flavor: `Men need many words before deeds. My axe is restless in my hands` -The Two Towers

name: Legolas
text:
Ranged.
Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, place 2 progress tokens on the current quest.

name: Thalin
text: While Thalin is committed to a quest, deal 1 damage to each enemy as it is revealed by the encounter deck.

name: Eowyn
text: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Éowyn +1 Willpower until the end of the phase. This effect may be triggered by each player once each round.

name: Eleanor
text: Response: Exhaust Eleanor to cancel the 'when revealed' effects of a treachery card just revealed by the encounter deck. Then, discard that card, and replace it with the next card from the encounter deck.

name: Dunhere
text: Dúnhere can target enemies in the staging area when he attacks alone. When doing so, he gets +1 Attack.

name: Denethor
text: Action: Exhaust Denethor to look at the top card of the encounter deck. You may move that card to the bottom of the deck.

name: Glorfindel
text: Action: Pay 1 resource from Glorfindel's pool to heal 1 damage on any character. (Limit once per round.)

name: Beravor
text: Action: Exhaust Beravor to choose a player. That player draws 2 cards. Limit once per round.

name: Faramir
text: Action: Exhaust Faramir to choose a player. Each character controlled by that player gets +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: Son of Arnor
text: Response: After Son of Arnor enters play, choose an enemy card in the staging area or currently engaged with another player. Engage that enemy.
flavor: ...and the North-realm they made in Arnor, and the South-realm in Gondor above the mouths of Anduin. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Snowbourn Scout
text: Response: After Snowbourn Scout enters play, choose a location. Place 1 progress token on that location.
flavor: ...he saw not a shadow, nor a blur, but the small figures of horsemen, many horsemen, and the glint of morning on the tips of their spears was like the twinkle of minute stars beyond the edge of mortal sight. -The Two Towers

name: Silverlode Archer
text: Ranged.
flavor: `We have been keeping watch on the rivers, ever since we saw a great troop of Orcs going north towards Moria, along the skirts of the mountains, many days ago.` -Haldir of Lórien, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Longbeard Orc Slayer
text: Response: After Longbeard Orc Slayer enters play, deal 1 damage to each Orc enemy in play.

name: Brok Ironfist
text: Response: After a Dwarf hero you control leaves play, put Brok Ironfist into play from your hand.

name: Gondorian Spearman
text:
Sentinel.
Response: After Gondorian Spearman is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Horseback Archer
text: Ranged.

name: Beorn
text: Action: Beorn gains +5 Attack until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase in which you trigger this effect, shuffle Beorn back into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

name: Wandering Took
text: Action: Reduce your threat by 3 to give control of Wandering Took to another player. Raise that player's threat by 3.

name: Lorien Guide
text: Response: After Lórien Guide commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on the active location.

name: Northern Tracker
text: Response: After Northern Tracker commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on each location in the staging area.
flavor: `What roads would any dare to tread, what safety would there be in quiet lands, or in the homes of simple men at night, if the Dúnedain were asleep, or were all gone into the grave?` -Aragorn, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Daughter of the Nimrodel
text: Action: Exhaust Daughter of the Nimrodel to heal up to 2 damage on any 1 hero.

name: Erebor Hammersmith
text: Response: After you play Erebor Hammersmith, return the topmost attachment in any player's discard pile to his hand.

name: Henamarth Riversong
text: Action: Exhaust Henamarth Riversong to look at the top card of the encounter deck.

name: Miner of the Iron Hills
text: Response: After Miner of the Iron Hills enters play, choose and discard 1 Condition attachment from play.

name: Gleowine
text: Action: Exhaust Gléowine to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

name: Ever Vigilant
text: Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.

name: Common Cause
text: Action: Exhaust 1 hero you control to choose and ready a different hero.

name: For Gondor!
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, all characters get +1 Attack. All Gondor characters also get +1 Defense until the end of the phase.

name: Sneak Attack
text: Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

name: Valiant Sacrifice
text: Response: After an ally card leaves play, that card's controller draws 2 cards.

name: Grim Resolve
text: Action: Ready all character cards in play.

name: Steward of Gondor
text:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Gondor trait.
Action: Exhaust Steward of Gondor to add 2 resources to attached hero's resource pool.
flavor: `It was commanded yesterday.` -Denethor, The Return of the King

name: Celebrian's Stone
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains +2 Willpower.
If attached hero is Aragorn, he also gains a Spirit resource icon.

name: Blade Mastery
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains +1 Attack and +1 Defense.

name: Rain of Arrows
text: Action: Exhaust a character you control with the ranged keyword to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.
flavor: Arrows thick as the rain came whistling over the battlements, and fell clinking and glancing on th estones. Many found their mark. -The Two Towers

name: Feint
text: Combat Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

name: Quick Strike
text: Action: Exhaust a character you control to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against any eligible enemy target.
flavor: `...for he that strikes the first blow, if he strikes it hard enough, may need to strike no more.` -Gandalf, The Two Towers

name: Thicket of Spears
text:
You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.
                
Action: Choose a player. That player's engaged enemies cannot attack that player this phase.

name: Swift Strike
text: Response: After a character is declared as a defender, deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Stand Together
text: Action: Choose a player. That player may declare any number of his eligible characters as defenders against each enemy attacking him this phase.
flavor: ...and when the task was done, there they would come to an end, alone, houseless, foodless in the midst of a terrible desert. There could be no return. -The Return of the King

name: Blade of Gondolin
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 Attack when attacking an Orc.
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1 progress token on the current quest.

name: Citadel Plate
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +4 Hit Points.

name: Dwarven Axe
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains +1 Attack. (+2 Attack instead if attached hero is a Dwarf.)

name: Horn of Gondor
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a hero.
Response: After a character leaves play, add 1 resource to attached hero's pool.

name: The Galadhrim's Greeting
text: Action: Reduce one player's threat by 6, or reduce each player's threat by 2.
flavor: `Welcome to Caras Galadhan!` he said. `Here is the city of the Galadhrim where dwell the Lord Celeborn and Galadriel the Lady of Lórien` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Strength of Will
text: Response: After you travel to a location, exhaust a Spirit character to place 2 progress tokens on that location.

name: Hasty Stroke
text: Response: Cancel a shadow effect just triggered during combat.

name: Will of the West
text: Action: Choose a player. Shuffle that player's discard pile back into his deck.
flavor: `If Gondor has such men still in these days of fading, great must have been its glory in the days of its rising.` -Legolas, The Return of the King

name: A Test of Will
text: Response: Cancel the 'when revealed' effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.

name: Stand and Fight
text: Action: Choose an ally with a printed cost of X in any player's discard pile. Put that ally into play under your control. (The chosen ally can belong to any sphere of influence.)
flavor: `...we will fight on.` -Boromir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: A Light in the Dark
text: Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. Return that enemy to the staging area.

name: Dwarven Tomb
text: Action: Return 1 Spirit card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Fortune or Fate
text: Action: Choose a hero in any player's discard pile. Put that card into play, under its owner's control.

name: The Favor of the Lady
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains +1 Willpower.

name: Power in the Earth
text:
Attach to a location.
Attached location gets -1 Threat.

name: Unexpected Courage
text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust Unexpected Courage to ready attached hero.

name: Lore of Imladris
text: Action: Choose a character. Heal all damage from that character.

name: Lorien's Wealth
text: Action: Choose a player. That player draws 3 cards.

name: Radagast's Cunning
text: Quest Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that enemy does not contribute its Threat.
flavor: `Radagast is, of course, a worthy Wizard, a master of shapes and changes of hue; and he has much lore of herbs and beasts, and birds are especially his friends.` -Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Secret Paths
text: Quest Action: Choose a location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that location does not contribute its Threat.
flavor: ...Beorn advised them to take this way; for at a place a few days' ride due north of the Carrock was the gate of a little-known pathway through Mirkwood... -The Hobbit

name: Gandalf's Search
text: Action: Look at the top X cards of any player's deck, add 1 of those cards to its owner's hand, and return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.

name: Beorn's Hospitality
text: Action: Choose a player. Heal all damage on each hero controlled by that player.

name: Forest Snare
text:
Attach to an enemy engaged with a player.
Attached enemy cannot attack.

name: Protector of Lorien
text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached hero +1 Defense or +1 Willpower until the end of the phase. Limit 3 times per phase.

name: Dark Knowledge
text:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gets -1 Willpower.
Response: Exhaust Dark Knowledge to look at 1 shadow card that was just dealt to an enemy attacking you.

name: Self Preservation
text:
Attach to a character.
Action: Exhaust Self Preservation to heal 2 points of damage from attached character.

name: Gandalf
text:
At the end of the round, discard Gandalf from play.
Response: After Gandalf enters play, (choose 1): draw 3 cards, deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play, or reduce your threat by 5.

name: Bilbo Baggins
text: The first player draws 1 additional card in the resource phase.
flavor: `Well, my dear fellow,` said bilbo, `now you've heard the news, can't you spare me a moment? I want your help in something urgent.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Dunedain Mark
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains +1 Attack.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Mark to another hero.

name: Campfire Tales
text: Action: Each player draws 1 card.
flavor: `It is a fair tale, though it is sad, as are all the tales of Middle-earth, and yet it may lift up your hearts.` -Strider, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Winged Guardian
text:
Sentinel.
Winged Guardian cannot have restricted attachments.
Forced: After an attack in which Winged Guardian defends resolves, pay 1 Tactics resource or discard Winged Guardian from play.

name: The Eagles Are Coming!
text: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Eagle cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
flavor: `The Eagles! The Eagles!` -Bilbo Baggins, The Hobbit

name: Westfold Horse-Breaker
text: Action: Discard Westfold Horse-Breaker to choose and ready a hero.
flavor: `Your own valour has done more, and the stout legs of the Westfold-men marching through the night.` -Gandalf, The Two Towers

name: Mustering the Rohirrim
text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any 1 Rohan ally card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
flavor: `More speed we cannot make, if the strength of Rohan is to be gathered.` -Éomer, The Return of the King

name: Rivendell Minstrel
text: Response: After you play Rivendell Minstrel from your hand, search your deck for 1 Song card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: As Elrond entered and went towards the seat prepared for him, Elvish minstrels began to make sweet music. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Strider's Path
text: Response: After a location is revealed from the encounter deck, immediately travel to that location without resolving its Travel effect. If another location is currently active, return it to the staging area.
flavor: `My cuts, short or long, don't go wrong.` -Strider, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Song of Kings
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains a Leadership resource icon.
flavor:
From the ashes a fire shall be woken,
A light from the shadows shall spring: 
Renewed shall be blade that was broken,
The crownless again shall be king.
-The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Frodo Baggins
text: Response: After Frodo Baggins is damaged, cancel the damage and instead raise your threat by the amount of damage he would have been dealt. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: Frodo began to feel restless, and the old paths seemed too well-trodden. he looked at maps and wondered what lay beyond their edges... -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Dunedain Warning
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains +1 Defense.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Warning to another hero.

name: Second Breakfast
text: Action: Each player returns the topmost attachment card from his discard pile to his hand.

name: Beorning Beekeeper
text: Action: Discard Beorning Beekeeper from play to deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area.
flavor: `We are getting near,` said Gandalf. `We are on th eedge of his bee pastures.` - The Hobbit

name: Born Aloft
text:
Attach to an ally.
Action: Discard Born Aloft from play to return attached ally to its owner's hand.
flavor: `Very well,` said Gandalf. `Take us where and as far as you will!` -The Hobbit

name: Eomund
text: Response: After Éomund leaves play, ready all Rohan characters in play.
flavor: `You I have not seen before, for you are young, but I have spoken with Eomund your father...` -Aragorn, The Two Towers

name: Nor am I a Stranger
text:
Attach to a character.
Attached character gains the Rohan trait.
flavor: `Nor indeed am I a stranger: for I have been in this land before, more than once, and ridden with the host of the Rohirrim, though under other name and in other guise.` -Aragorn, The Two Towers

name: Longbeard Map-Maker
text: Action: Spend 1 Lore resource to give Longbeard Map-Maker +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.
flavor: On the table in the light of a big lamp with a red shade he spread a piece of parchment rather like a map. -The Hobbit

name: A Burning Brand
text:
Attach to a Lore character.
While attached character is defending, cancel any shadow effects on cards dealt to the attacking enemy.
flavor: `Keep close to the fire, with your faces outward!` cried Strider. `Keep some of th elonger sticks ready in your hands.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Song of Wisdom
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains a Lore resource icon.

name: Prince Imrahil
text: Response: After a character leaves play, ready Prince Imrahil. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: But beyond, in the great fief of Belfalas, dwelt Prince Imrahil in his castle of Dol Amroth by the sea, and he was of high blood, and his fold also, tall men and proud with sea-grey eyes. -The Return of the King.

name: Dunedain Quest
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains +1 Willpower.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Quest to another hero.

name: Parting Gifts
text: Action: Move any number of resource tokens from a Leadership hero's resource pool to any other hero's resource pool.
flavor: Inside the hall there was piled a large assortment of packages and parcels and small articles of furniture. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Landroval
text:
Sentinel.
Landroval cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After a hero card is destroyed, return Landroval to his owner's hand to put that hero back into play, with 1 damage token on it. (Limit once per game.)

name: To the Eyrie
text: Response: After an ally is destroyed, exhaust 1 Eagle character to move that ally from the discard pile to its owner's hand.
flavor: The pale peaks of the mountains were coming nearer, moonlit spikes of rock sticking out of black shadows. -The Hobbit

name: Escort from Edoras
text:
While committed to a quest, Escort from Edoras gets +2 Willpower.
Forced: After resolving a quest to which Escort from Edoras was committed, discard Escort from Edoras from play.

name: Ancient Mathom
text:
Attach to a location.
Response: After attached location is explored, the first player draws 3 cards.
flavor: The Mathom-house it was called; for anything that Hobbits had no immediate use for, but were unwilling to throw away, they called a mathom. Their dwellings were apt to become rather crowded with mathoms... -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Haldir of Lorien
text: Ranged.. Sentinel.
flavor: `But there are some of us still who go abroad for the gathering of news and the watching of our enemies, and they speak the languages of other lands.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Infighting
text: Action: Move any number of damage from one enemy to another.
flavor: That's cursed rebel-talk, and I'll stick you, if you don't shut it down, see? -Orc Soldier, The Return of the King

name: Radagast
text:
Radagast collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Creature cards played from your hand.
Action: Spend X resources from Radagast's pool to heal X wounds on any 1 Creature.
flavor: `I have an urgent errand. My news is evil.`

name: Brand son of Bain
text:
Ranged.
Response: After Brand son of Bain attacks and defeats an enemy engaged with another player, choose and ready one of that player's characters.

name: Keen-eyed Took
text:
Response: After Keen-eyed Took enters play, reveal the top card of each player's deck.
Action: Return Keen-eyed Took to your hand to discard the top card of each player's deck.

name: Rear Guard
text: Quest Action: Discard a Leadership ally to give each hero committed to this quest +1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: Descendant of Thorondor
text:
Descendant of Thorondor cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After Descendant of Thorondor enters or leaves play, deal 2 damage to any 1 enemy in the staging area.

name: Meneldor's Flight
text: Action: Choose an Eagle ally. Return that character to its owner's hand.

name: The Riddermark's Finest
text: Action: Exhaust and discard The Riddermark's Finest to place 2 progress tokens on any location.

name: Ride to Ruin
text: Action: Discard a Rohan ally to choose a location. Place 3 progress tokens on that location.

name: Gildor Inglorion
text: Action: Exhaust Gildor Inglorion to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card from your hand. Then, return the 3 cards to the top of your deck, in any order.

name: Gildor's Counsel
text:
Play during the Quest phase, before characters are committed to the Quest.
Action: Reveal 1 less card from the encounter deck this phase. (To a minimum of 1.)

name: Song of Travel
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains a Spirit resource icon.

name: Boromir
text:
Action: Raise your threat by 1 to ready Boromir.
Action: Discard Boromir to deal 2 damage to each enemy engaged with a single player.
flavor: `...in Gondor we must trust to such weapons as we have.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Dunedain Watcher
text: Response: Discard Dunedain Watcher from play to cancel the shadow effects of a card just triggered.
flavor: `If simple folk are free from care and fear, simple they will be, and we must be secret to keep them so. That has been the task of my kindred, while the years have lengthened and the grass has grown.` -Strider, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Dunedain Cache
text:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains ranged.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Cache to another hero.

name: Vassal of the Windlord
text:
Ranged.
Vassal of the Windlord cannot have restricted attachments.
Forced: After an attack in which Vassal of the Windlord attacked resolves, discard Vassal of the Windlord from play.

name: Song of Mocking
text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust Song of Mocking to choose another hero. Until the end of the phase, attached hero takes all damage assigned to the chosen hero.
flavor:
Old fat spider spinning in a tree!
Old fat spider can't see me!
Attercop! Attercop!
Won't you stop. Stop your spinning and look for me! 
-Bilbo Baggins, The Hobbit

name: Elfhelm
text: While Elfhelm is ready, he gains: 'Response: After your threat is raised as the result of questing unsuccessfully, or by an encounter or quest card effect, reduce your threat by 1.'
flavor: `Buy my lord sends word that we must set ourselves in readiness: orders may come for a sudden move.` -The Return of the King

name: We Do Not Sleep
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, Rohan characters do not exhaust to commit to quests.
flavor: `But we must ride more warily; for war is abroad, and the Rohirrim, the Horse-lords, do not sleep, even if it seems so from afar.` -Gandalf, The Two Towers

name: Silvan Tracker
text: Response: After a Silvan character readies during the refresh phase, heal 1 damage from that character.
flavor: `The Wood-elves tracked him first, an easy task for them, for his trail was still fresh then.` -Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Rings

name: Fast Hitch
text:
Attach to a Hobbit character.
Action: Exhaust Fast Hitch to ready attached character.
flavor: 'And I put as fast a hitch over the stump as any one could have done, in the Shire or out of it.' -Sam, The Two Towers

name: Song of Battle
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains a Tactics resource icon.
flavor: We go, we go, we go to war, to hew the stone and break the door. -The Two Towers

name: Dain Ironfoot
text: While Dain Ironfoot is ready, Dwarf characters get +1 Attack and +1 Willpower.
flavor: `You have not heard of Dain and the dwarves of the Iron Hills?` -Bilbo Baggins, The Hobbit

name: Dunedain Signal
text:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains sentinel.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Signal to another hero.

name: Dawn Take You All
text:
Play after shadow cards have been dealt, before any attacks have resolved.
Combat Action: Each player may choose and discard 1 facedown shadow card from an enemy with which he is engaged.
flavor: `Dawn take you all, and be stone to you!` -Gandalf, The Hobbit

name: Eagles of the Misty Mountains
text:
Eagles of the Misty Mountains cannot have restricted attachments. Eagles of the Misty Mountains gets +1 Attack and +1 Defense for each facedown attachment it has.
Response: After another Eagle character leaves play, you may attach that card facedown to Eagles of the Misty Mountains.

name: Support of the Eagles
text:
Attach to a Tactics hero.
Action: Exhaust Support of the Eagles to choose an Eagle ally. Until the end of the phase, attached hero adds that ally's Attack or Defense (choose 1) to its own.
flavor: `I would bear you, whither you will, even were you made of stone.` -Gwaihir, The Return of the King

name: West Road Traveller
text: Response: After you play West Road Traveller from your hand, switch the active location with any other location in the staging area.
flavor: The dark world was rushing by, and the wind sang loudly in his ears. -The Return of the King

name: Astonishing Speed
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, all Rohan characters get +2 Willpower.
flavor: With astonishing speed and skill they checked their steeds, wheeled, and came charging round. -The Two Towers

name: Mirkwood Runner
text: While Mirkwood Runner is attacking alone, the defending enemy does not count its Defense.
flavor: `...let a ploughman plough, but choose an otter for swimming, and for running light over grass and leaf or over snow-an Elf.` -Legolas, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Rumour from the Earth
text: Action: Look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may pay 1 Lore resource to return Rumour from the Earth to your hand.
flavor: 'Where sight fails the earth may bring us rumour,' said Aragorn. 'The land must groan under their hated feet.' -The Two Towers

name: Shadow of the Past
text: Action: Move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck.
flavor: The wizard's face remained grave and attentive, and only a flicker in his deep eyes showed that he was startled and indeed alarmed. 'It has been called that before,' he said, 'but not by you.' -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Dwalin
text: Response: After Dwalin attacks and destroys an Orc enemy, lower your threat by 2.

name: Bifur
text: Action: Pay 1 resource from a hero's resource pool to add 1 resource to Bifur's resource pool. Any player may trigger this ability. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: `And winter comes after autumn.` - Bifur, The Hobbit

name: Narvi's Belt
text:
Attach to a Dwarf hero.
Action: Exhaust Narvi's Belt to give attached hero a Leadership, Lore, Tactics, or Spirit icon until the end of the phase.

name: Durin's Song
text: Action: Choose a Dwarf hero. That hero gets +2 Willpower, +2 Attack, and +2 Defense until the end of the round.
flavor:
A king he was on carven throne
In many-pillared halls of stone
With golden roof and silver floor,
And runes of power upon the door.
-The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Ever Onward
text: Response: After players quest unsuccessfully, choose a player. That player does not raise his threat.

name: Veteran of Nanduhirion
text: Veteran of Nanduhirion enters play with 1 damage on it.
flavor: With cries of `Moria!` and `Dain, Dain!` the dwarves of the Iron Hills plunged in... -The Hobbit

name: Dwarrowdelf Axe
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Dwarf character.
Attached character gets +1 Attack.
Response: After attached character attacks, deal 1 damage to the defending enemy.
flavor: `We make good armour and keen swords, but we cannot again make mail or blade to match those that were made before the dragon came.` -Gloin, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Khazad! Khazad!
text: Action: Choose a Dwarf character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 Attack.

name: Zigil Miner
text: Action: Exhaust Zigil Miner and name a number to discard the top 2 cards of your deck. If at least one of those cards has cost equal to the named number, choose a hero you control. For each card that matches the named number, add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

name: Untroubled by Darkness
text: Action: Each Dwarf character gets +1 Willpower until the end of the phase. (+2 Willpower instead if the active location is an Underground or Dark location.)

name: Erebor Record Keeper
text:
Erebor Record Keeper cannot attack or defend.

Action: Exhaust Erebor Record Keeper and pay 1 Lore resource to choose and ready a Dwarf character.

name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Action: Exhaust a Dwarf character to place 2 progress tokens on the active location. (4 progress tokens instead if it is an Underground or Mountain location.)

name: Boots from Erebor
text:
Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character. Limit 1 Boots from Erebor per character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point.

name: Elrohir
text:
While Elladan is in play, Elrohir gets +2 Defense.

Response: After Elrohir is declared as a defender, pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Taking Initiative
text: Action: Discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card's printed cost is equal to or higher than the number of characters you control, draw 2 cards and deal 2 damage to any enemy.

name: Timely Aid
text:
Secrecy 3.
Action: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and put 1 revealed ally into play, if able. Shuffle all other revealed cards back into your deck.

name: Unseen Strike
text: Action: Choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 Attack while attacking an enemy with a higher engagement cost than your threat.

name: Keeping Count
text:
Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero.

Attached hero gets +1 Attack for each resource token on another copy of Keeping Count that is above the current number of resource tokens on this card.

Forced: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1 resource token on this card.

name: Bofur
text: Quest Action: Spend 1 Spirit resource to put Bofur into play from your hand, exhausted and committed to a quest. If you quest successfully this phase and Bofur is still in play, return him to your hand.

name: Renewed Friendship
text: Response: After another player plays an attachment on a hero you control, you may (choose 1): ready 1 of that player's heroes, have that player draw 1 card, or lower that player's threat by 2.

name: Ravenhill Scout
text: Action: Exhaust Ravenhill Scout to move up to 2 progress tokens from 1 location to another location.
flavor: `They made their first camp on the western side of the great southern spur, which ended in a height called Ravenhill.` -The Hobbit

name: Needful to Know
text:
Secrecy 2.
Action: Raise your threat by 1 to look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, reduce your threat by X, where X is the threat of that card.

name: Good Meal
text:
Attach to a Hobbit hero.
Action: Discard Good Meal to lower the cost of the next event you play this round that matches attached hero's sphere by 2.

name: Elladan
text:
While Elrohir is in play, Elladan gets +2 Attack.

Response: After Elladan is declared as an attacker, pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Dunedain Wanderer
text: Ranged.. Sentinel.. Secrecy 3.

name: Lure of Moria
text: Action: Ready all Dwarf characters.

name: Rivendell Blade
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character.
When attached character attacks an enemy, that enemy gets -2 Defense until the end of the phase.

name: Hail of Stones
text: Action: Exhaust X characters to deal X damage to an enemy in the staging area.

name: Rider of the Mark
text: Action: Spend 1 Spirit resource to give control of Rider of the Mark to another player. (Limit once per round.)Response: After Rider of the Mark changes control, discard a shadow card dealt to an enemy you are engaged with.

name: Song of Earendil
text:
Attach to a Spirit hero.

Response: After Song of Eärendil enters play, draw 1 card.
                
Response: After another player raises his threat, raise your threat by 1 to reduce that player's threat by 1.

name: Bombur
text: Action: Exhaust Bombur to choose a location. That location gets -1 Threat until the end of the phase. (That location does not contribute its Threat instead if it is an Underground location.)

name: Out of the Wild
text:
Secrecy 2.
Action: Search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for any 1 non-objective card worth no victory points and add it to your victory display. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The End Comes
text: Response: After a Dwarf character leaves play, shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

name: Aragorn
text:
Sentinel.
Refresh Action: Reduce your threat to your starting threat level. (Limit once per game.)

name: Grave Cairn
text: Response: After a character leaves play, add its Attack to another character's Attack until the end of the round.

name: Sword that was Broken
text:
Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains a Leadership resource icon.
If attached hero is Aragorn, each character you control gets +1 Willpower.

name: Watcher of the Bruinen
text:
Sentinel.
Watcher of the Bruinen does not exhaust to defend.
Forced: After Watcher of the Bruinen defends, either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Rivendell Bow
text:
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character, or to Aragorn. Limit 1 per character.
Attached character gains ranged.If attached character has a printed ranged keyword, it gets +1 Attack during a ranged attack.

name: Arwen Undomiel
text: Response: After Arwen Undómiel exhausts, choose a character. That character gains sentinel and gets +1 Defense until the end of the round.

name: Elrond's Counsel
text: Action: If you control a unique Noldor character, give another character +1 Willpower until the end of the phase and lower your threat by 3.

name: Short Cut
text: Response: After a location enters play, exhaust a Hobbit character to shuffle that location back into the encounter deck. Then, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

name: Legacy of Durin
text:
Attach to a Dwarf hero.
Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, draw 1 card.

name: Resourceful
text:
Secrecy 3.
Attach to a hero you control.
Attached hero collects 1 additional resource during the resource phase each round.

name: Hama
text: Response: After Hama is declared as an attacker, return a Tactics event from your discard pile to your hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Erestor
text: Action: Choose and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Fresh Tracks
text: Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area, deal 1 damage to that enemy. Players ignore that enemy while making engagement checks this round.

name: Erebor Battle Master
text: Erebor Battle Master gets +1 Attack for each other Dwarf ally you control.

name: Ring Mail
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point and +1 Defense.

name: Out of Sight
text:
Secrecy 3.
Action: Enemies engaged with you cannot attack you this phase.

name: Ever My Heart Rises
text:
Attach to a Dwarf character.
Response: After you travel to a Mountain or Underground location, ready attached character and reduce your threat by 1.

name: Warden of Healing
text: Action: Exhaust Warden of Healing to heal 1 damage on up to 2 different characters. Then, you may pay 2 Lore resources to ready Warden of Healing.
flavor: `But for long years we healers have only sought to patch the rents made by the men of swords.` -Return of the King

name: Word of Command
text: Action: Exhaust an Istari character to search your deck for 1 card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: `Picking up a faggot he held it aloft for a moment, and then with a word of command, naur an edraith ammen! he thrust the end of his staff into the midst of it. At once a great spout of green and blue flame sprang out, and the wood flared and sputtered.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Love of Tales
text:
Attach to a Lore hero. Limit 1 per hero.
Response: After a Song card is played, add 1 resource to attached hero's resource pool.

name: Glorfindel
text: Forced: After Glorfindel exhausts to commit to a quest, raise your threat by 1.
flavor:
Glorfindel was tall and straight; his hair was of shining gold, his face fair and young and fearless and full of joy; his eyes were bright and keen, and has voice like music; on his brow sat wisdom, and in his hand was strength.
-The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Longbeard Elder
text: Response: After Longbeard Elder commits to a quest, look at the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a location, place 1 progress token on the current quest. Otherwise, Longbeard Elder gets -1 Willpower until the end of the phase.

name: Path of Need
text: Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a location. Heroes do not exhaust to attack, defend, or commit to a quest while attached location is the active location.

name: Trollshaw Scout
text:
Ranged.
Trollshaw Scout does not exhaust to attack.
Forced: After Trollshaw Scout attacks, either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Heavy Stroke
text: Response: After a Dwarf deals X damage to an enemy during combat, deal an additional X damage to that enemy. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: `Beside them Gimli stood with his stout legs apart, wielding his dwarf-axe.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Imladris Stargazer
text: Action: Exhaust Imladris Stargazer to choose a player. That player looks at the top 5 cards of his deck and then returns them to the top of his deck in any order.

name: Light of Valinor
text:
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero.
Attached hero does not exhaust to commit to a quest.
flavor:
`... those who have dwelt in the blassed realm live at once in both worlds, and against both the Seen and Unseen they have great power.`
-Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Daeron's Runes
text: Action: Draw 2 cards. Then, discard 1 card from your hand.
flavor:
`These are Daeron's Runes, such as were used of old in Moria...`
-Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Healing Herbs
text:
Attach to a Lore hero.
Action: Discard Healing Herbs and exhaust attached hero to heal all damage on 1 character.

name: Asfaloth
text:
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero.
Action: Exhaust Asfaloth to place 1 progress token on any location. (2 tokens instead if attached hero is Glorfindel.)
flavor: Suddenly into view below came a white horse, gleaming in the shadows, running swiftly. In the dusk its headstall flickered and flashed as if it were studded with gems like living stars. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Elrond
text:
You may spend resources from Elrond's resource pool to pay for Spirit, Leadership, and Tactics allies.
Response: After a character is healed by another card effect, heal 1 damage on it.

name: We Are Not Idle
text: Action: Exhaust X Dwarf characters to add X resources to a hero's resource pool and draw 1 card.
flavor: `You should see the stone-paved roads of many colours! And the halls and cavernous streets under the earth with arches carved like trees; and the terraces and towers upon the Mountain's sides! Then you would see that we have not been idle.` -Glóin, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Hardy Leadership
text:
Attach to a Leadership hero.
Each Dwarf character gets +1 hit point.

name: Hands Upon the Bow
text: Action: Exhaust a character you control with ranged to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against an enemy in the staging area. It gets +1 Attack during this attack.

name: O Elbereth! Gilthonial!
text:
Secrecy 4.
Response: After an enemy attacks you, put that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck. If your threat is lower than that enemy's engagement cost, set your threat equal to the engagement cost of that enemy.

name: Miruvor
text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Discard Miruvor to (choose two): ready attached hero, add 1 resource to attached hero's resource pool, attached hero gets +1 Willpower until the end of the round, or put Miruvor on the top of your deck.

name: Master of the Forge
text: Action: Exhaust Master of the Forge to search the top 5 cards of your deck for any 1 attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Peace, and Thought
text: Refresh Action: Exhaust 2 heroes to draw 5 cards.

name: Risk Some Light
text:
Secrecy 3.
Action: Look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. You may select 1 card and move it to the bottom of the encounter deck. Return any unselected cards to the top of the encounter deck, in any order.

name: Vilya
text:
Attach to Elrond. He gains a Spirit resource icon.
Action: Exhaust Elrond and Vilya to reveal the top card of your deck. You can immediately play or put into play the revealed card for no cost, if able. Otherwise, move the revealed card to the bottom of your deck.

name: Beregond
text:
Sentinel.
Lower the cost to play Weapon and Armor attachments on Beregond by 2.
flavor: `It is over-late to send for aid when you are already besieged.` -The Return of the King

name: Boromir
text: While Boromir has at least 1 resource in his resource pool, Gondor allies get +1 Attack.
flavor: `By our valour the wild fold of the East are still restrained, and the terror of Morgul kept at bay...` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Errand-rider
text: Action: Exhaust Errand-rider to move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another hero's resource pool.
flavor: For the people of the City used horses very little and they were seldom seen in their streets, save only those ridden by the errand-riders of their lord. -The Return of the King

name: Citadel Custodian
text: Lower the cost to play Citadel Custodian by 1 for each Gondor ally in play.

name: Mutual Accord
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each Gondor card in play gains the Rohan trait, and each Rohan card in play gains the Gondor trait.
flavor: `These are the Rohirrim, as we name them, masters of horses... and have ever proved true to us, aiding us at need, and guarding our northern marches and the Gap of Rohan.` -Faramir, The Two Towers

name: Wealth of Gondor
text: Action: Choose a Gondor hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.
flavor: Kings made tombs more splendid than houses of the living, and counted old names in the rolls of their descent dearer than the names of sons. -The Two Towers

name: Defender of Rammas
flavor: `And the Enemy must pay dearly for the crossing of the River.` -Denethor, The Return of the King

name: Behind Strong Walls
text: Action: Ready a defending Gondor character. That character gets +1 Defense until the end of the phase.
flavor: ...seven walls of stone so strong and old that it seemed to have been not builded by carven by giants out of the bones of the earth. -The Return of the King

name: Spear of the Citadel
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Tactics character. Limit 1 per character.
Response: After attached character is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Damrod
text: Action: Discard Damrod from play to lower your threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.

name: Light the Beacons
text: Action: All characters get +2 Defense and do not exhaust to defend until the end of the round.
flavor: `The beacons of Gondor are alight, calling for aid.` -Gandalf, The Return of the King

name: A Watchful Peace
text: Response: After a location leaves play as an explored location, return it to the top of the encounter deck.

name: Blood of Numenor
text:
Attach to a Gondor or Dúnedain hero.
Action: Spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to give attached hero +1 Defense for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: `Believe not that in the land of Gondor the blood of Numenor is spent, nor all its pride and dignity forgotten.` -Boromir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Hunter of Lamedon
text: Response: After you play Hunter of Lamedon from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Outlands card, add it to your hand. Otherwise, discard it.
flavor: From Lamedon, a few grim hillmen without a captain. -The Return of the King

name: Ithilien Tracker
text: Action: Exhaust Ithilien Tracker to lower the Threat of the next enemy added to the staging area to 0 until the end of the phase.
flavor: Green gauntlets covered their hands, and their faces were hooded and masked with green, except for their eyes, which were very keen and bright. -The Two Towers

name: Master of Lore
text: Action: Exhaust Master of Lore to name a card type. Lower the cost for you to play the next Lore card of that type by 1 until the end of the phase (to a minimum of 1).
flavor: `If Cirith Ungol is named, old men and masters of lore will blanch and fall silent.` -Faramir, The Two Towers

name: Ranger Spikes
text:
Play Ranger Spikes into the staging area unattached.
If unattached, attach Ranger Spikes to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.Players do not make engagement checks against attached enemy. Attached enemy gets -2 Threat.

name: Envoy of Pelargir
text: Response: After Envoy of Pelargir enters play, add 1 resource to a Gondor or Noble hero's resource pool.

name: Hirluin the Fair
text:
Ranged.
You may use resources from Hirluin the Fair's resource pool to pay for Outlands ally cards of any sphere.
flavor: Hirluin the Fair of the Green Hills from Pinnath Gelin... -The Return of the King

name: Warrior of Lossarnach
text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 Defense.
flavor: ... grim-faced they were, and shorter and somewhat swarthier than any men that Pippin had yet seen in Gondor. - The Return of the King

name: Gaining Strength
text: Action: Discard 2 resources from your hero's resource pool to add 3 resources to that hero's resource pool.
flavor: `Nay, my friends, I am the lawful master of the Stone, and I had both the right and the strength to use it...` -Aragorn, The Return of the King

name: Knights of the Swan
text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 Attack.
flavor: ...foremost on the field rode the swan-knights of Dol Amroth with their Prince and his blue banner at their head. -The Return of the King

name: Gondorian Shield
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero.
Attached hero gains +1 Defense. (+2 Defense instead if attached hero has the Gondor trait.)
flavor: There flowered a White Tree, and that was for Gondor... -The Return of the King

name: Ethir Swordsman
text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 Willpower.

name: Ring of Barahir
text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 hit point for each Artifact attachment attached to it.
If attached hero is Aragorn, he also gains a Lore resource icon.

name: Anfalas Herdsman
text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 hit point.
flavor: From the Anfalas, the Langstrand far away, a long line of men of many sorts, hunters and herdsmen and men of little villages... -The Return of the King

name: Mithrandir's Advice
text: Action: Draw 1 card for each hero you control with a printed Lore resource icon.
flavor: `Let none now reject the counsels of Gandalf, whose long labours against Sauron come at last to their test.` -Aragorn, The Return of the King

name: A Good Harvest
text: Action: Name a sphere. Until the end of the phase, you can spend resources of any sphere when paying for cards that belong to the named sphere.
flavor: The townlands were rich, with wide tilth and many orchards, and homesteads there were with oast and garner, fold and byre, and many rills rippling through the green from the highlands down to the Anduin. -The Return of the King

name: Mirlonde
text: Each hero you control with a printed Lore resource icon gets -1 threat cost.

name: Forlong
text: While you control Outlands allies that belong to 4 different spheres, ready Forlong at the beginning of each phase.
flavor: `Forlong!` men shouted. `True heart, true friend!` -The Return of the King

name: Strength of Arms
text:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed Leadership resource icon.
Action: Ready each ally in play.
flavor: And so the companies came and were hailed and cheered and passed through the Gate, men of the Outlands marching to defend the City of Gondor in a dark hour... -The Return of the King

name: Mighty Prowess
text:
Attach to a Tactics hero. Limit 1 per hero.
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, deal 1 damage to another enemy that shares a Trait with the enemy just destroyed.
flavor: He slew many of them and the rest fled. -The Two Towers

name: Trained for War
text:
Play only if each hero you control has the printed Tactics resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase, if the current quest has no keyword it gains Battle.

name: Silvan Refugee
text: Forced: After a character leaves play, discard Silvan Refugee from play.
flavor: `The Elves have their own labours and their own sorrows...` -Gildor, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Against the Shadow
text:
Play only if each hero you control has the printed Spirit resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase, Spirit characters use their Willpower instead of Defense.
flavor: `Courage will now be your best defense against the storm that is at hand...` -Gandalf, The Return of the King

name: Harbor Master
text: Response: After a card effect adds any number of resources to the resource pool of a hero you control, Harbor Master gains +1 Defense until the end of the round.
flavor: For the Elves of the High Kindred had not yet forsaken Middle-earth, and they dwelt still at that time at the Grey Havens...-The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Advance Warning
text:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed Lore resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase, enemies do not make engagement checks
flavor: Suddenly he halted and listened. Had he heard a whistle or not? Or was it the call of some strange bird? -The Two Towers

name: White Tower Watchman
text: If each hero you control belongs to the same sphere of influence, you may assign damage from undefended enemy attacks to White Tower Watchman instead of a hero you control.
flavor: The watchmen cried aloud, and all men in the City stood to arms. -The Return of the King

name: Pippin
text: If each hero you control has the Hobbit trait, Pippin gains: 'Response: After an enemy engages you, raise your threat by 3 to return it to the staging area. Until the end of the round, that enemy cannot engage you.'
flavor: `There must be someone with intelligence in the party.` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Denethor
text:
Denethor gets -1 Willpower for each damaged hero you control.
Discard Denethor if his Willpower is 0 or less.
flavor: `Denethor is of another sort, proud and subtile, a man of far greater lineage and power, though he is not called a king.` -Gandalf, The Return of the King

name: Lord of Morthond
text:
Attach to a Gondor or Outlands hero.
If each hero you control has a printed Leadership resource icon, Lord of Morthond gains: 'Response: After you play a Lore, Spirit, or Tactics ally, draw 1 card.'
flavor: `The Captains of the Outlands are expected up the South Road ere sundown. Come with us and you will see.` -Bergil, The Return of the King

name: Book of Eldacar
text:
Attach to a Tactics hero.
Reduce the cost to play Book of Eldacar by 1 for each hero you control with a printed Tactics resource icon.
Action: Discard Book of Eldacar to play any Tactics event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Gondorian Discipline
text: Response: Cancel up to 2 points of damage just dealt to a Gondor character.
flavor: At last, less than a mile from the City, a more ordered mass of men came into view, marching not running, still holding together. -The Return of the King

name: Minas Tirith Lampwright
text: Response: After an encounter card with surge is revealed, discard Minas Tirith Lampwright to name enemy, location, or treachery. If the next encounter card revealed is the named type, discard it without resolving its effects.

name: Small Target
text: Response: After a Hobbit hero you control exhausts to defend an attack, choose another enemy engaged with you and reveal the attacking enemy's shadow card. If that shadow card has no shadow effect, resolve this enemy's attack against the chosen enemy. If that shadow card has a shadow effect, resolve this attack as normal.

name: Ithilien Archer
text:
Ranged.
Response: After Ithilien Archer attacks and damages an enemy, return that enemy to the staging area.

name: Ithilien Pit
text:
Play Ithilien Pit into the staging area unattached.

If unattached, attach Ithilien Pit to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.

Any character may choose attached enemy as the target of an attack.

name: Hobbit-sense
text: Play only if each of your heroes is a Hobbit. Combat Action: Enemies engaged with you do not attack this round. You cannot declare attacks this round.
flavor: They possessed from the first the art of disappearing swiftly and silently, when large folk whom they do not wish to meet come blundering by... -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Faramir
text:
Ranged.
Faramir gets +1 Attack for each enemy in the staging area.
flavor: `The road may pass, but they shall not! Not while Faramir is Captain.` -Mablung, The Two Towers

name: Sword of Morthond
text:
Attach to a Gondor ally.
Attached ally gains the Outlands trait.
flavor:
The Morthond Valye made a great bay that beat up against the sheer southern faces of the mountains.
-The Return of the King

name: Men of the West
text: Action: Return X Outlands allies from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor:
Death in the morning and at day's ending
lords took and lowly. Long now they sleep
under grass in Gondor by the Great River.
-The Return of the King

name: Knight of Minas Tirith
text: If each of your heroes has a printed Tactics resource icon, Knight of Minas Tirith gains: `Response: After Knight of Minas Tirith enters play, choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage that enemy and exhaust Knight of Minas Tirith to declare it as attacker (and resolve its attack) against that enemy.`

name: Gondorian Fire
text:
Attach to a Gondor or Dúnedain hero.
Action: Spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to give attached hero +1 Attack for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Pelargir Shipwright
text: Pelargir Shipwright gets +1 Willpower for each hero you control with a printed Spirit resource icon.
flavor:
`It is forty leagues and two from Pelargir to the landings at the Harlond...`
-Aragorn, The Return of the King

name: Map of Earnil
text:
Attach to a Spirit hero.
Reduce the cost to play Map of Earnil by 1 for each hero you control with a printed Spirit resource icon.
Action: Discard Map of Earnil to play any Spirit event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Ranger Bow
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Ranger character.
Action: Exhaust Ranger Bow and attached character to deal 1 damage to an enemy in the staging area.
flavor:
Two had great bows, almost of their own height, and great quivers of long green-feathered arrows.
-The Two Towers

name: Forest Patrol
text:
Play only if you control at least 1 Ranger character.
Action: Deal 3 damage to an enemy with at least 1 Trap card attached to it.
flavor: `For coming unbidden to this play death is our law.` -Anborn, The Two Towers

name: Palantir
text:
Attach to a Noble hero.
Planning Action: Exhaust Palantir and attached hero to name a card type and look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that matches the named type, draw a card. For each of those cards that does not match the named type, raise your threat by 2.

name: Caldara
text: Action: Discard Caldara to put 1 Spirit ally from your discard pile into play for each other hero you control with a printed Spirit resource icon.
flavor:
...there is no purpose higher in the world as it now stands than the good of Gondor...
-Denethor, The Return of the King

name: Squire of the Citadel
text: Response: After Squire of the Citadel leaves play, add 1 resource to a Gondor hero's resource pool.
flavor:
As he spoke he struck a small silver gong that stood near his footstool, and at once servants came forward.
-The Return of the King

name: Tome of Atanatar
text:
Attach to a Leadership hero. Reduce the cost to play Tome of Atanatar by 1 for each hero you control with a printed Leadership resource icon.
Action: Discard Tome of Atanatar to play any Leadership event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Guthlaf
text:
If there is at least 1 Rohan hero in play, lower the cost to play Guthlaf by 1.
If there is at least 1 Gondor hero in play, Guthlaf gains sentinel.

name: The Hammer-stroke
text: Encounter Action: Engage each enemy in play.
flavor:
..we have this honour: ever we bear the brunt of the chief hatred of the Dark Lord, for that hatred comes down out of the of the depths of time and over the deeps of the Sea.
-Denethor, The Return of the King

name: Emery
text: Action: Discard the top 3 card of your deck to put Emery into play from your hand, under any player's control. Then, if any of the discarded cards have the Tactics, Lore or Leadership sphere, discard Emery.

name: Children of the Sea
text: Action: Choose a Silvan or Noldor ally you control. That ally gets +2 Willpower until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, shuffle that ally into its owner's deck if it is still in play.
flavor:
`For deep in the hears of all my kindred lies the sea-longing, which it is perilous to stir`
-Legolas, The Return of the King

name: Anborn
text: Action: Exhaust Anborn to return 1 Trap card from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor:
`I sent my keenest huntsmen to seek him, but he slipped them, and they had no sight of him till now, save Anborn.`
-Faramir, The Two Towers

name: Poisoned Stakes
text:
Play Poisoned Stakes into the staging area unattached.
If unattached, attach Poisoned Stakes to the next eligble enemy that enters the staging area.
At the end of each round, deal 2 damage to attached enemy.

name: Well-Equipped
text: Action: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. You may attach 1 attachment card discarded by this effect to an eligible Dwarf character in play.
flavor:
Gimli the Dwarf alone wore openly a short shirt of steel-rings, for dwarves make light of burdens...
-The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Theoden
text:
Sentinel.
Each hero with a printed Tactics resource icon gets +1 Willpower.
flavor: 'To me! To me!' cried Théoden. 'Up Eorlingas! Fear no darkness!' - The Return of the King

name: Pelargir Ship Captain
text: Response: After Pelargir Ship Captain enters play, move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another hero's resource pool.

name: Visionary Leadership
text:
Attach to a Gondor hero.
While attached hero has at least 1 resource in its resource pool, Gondor characters get +1 Willpower.
flavor: `...still the lords of Gondor have keener sight than lesser men...` -Denethor, The Return of the King

name: Spear of the Mark
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Rohan character.
Attached character gets +1 Attack. (+2 Attack instead if attacking an enemy in the staging area).
flavor: Right through the press drove Théoden Thengel's son, and his spear was shivered as he threw down thier chieftan. -The Return of the King

name: Forth Eorlingas!
text: Combat Action: Each Rohan hero can be declared as an attacker against enemies in the staging area this phase.
flavor: `Oaths ye have taken: now fulfill them all, to lord and land and league of friendship!` -Théoden, The Return of the King

name: Steed of the Mark
text:
Attach to a Gondor or Rohan hero.
Response: after attached hero commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to ready attached hero.
flavor: ...fresh horses were always in readiness to bear his errand-riders to Rohan in the Noth... -The Return of the King

name: Lay of Nimrodel
text: Action: Choose a Spirit hero. Until the end of the phase, that hero gets +1 Willpower for each resource in its resource pool.
flavor:
An Elven-maid there was of old.
A shining star by day:
Her mantle white was hemmed with hold,
Her shoes of silver-grey.
-The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Ered Nimrais Prospector
text: Response: After Ered Nimrais Prospector enters play, discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, choose and shuffle 1 card from your discard pile back into your deck.

name: Scroll of Isildur
text:
Attach to a Lore hero.
Reduce the cost to play Scroll of Isildur by 1 for each hero you control with a printed Lore resource icon.
Action: Discard Scroll of Isildur to play any Lore event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Hidden Cache
text:
Response: After Hidden Cache is discarded from your deck, add 2 resources to the resource pool of a hero you control.
Action: Spend 1 resource to draw 1 card.
flavor:
...there was a good deal of food jumbled carlessly on shelves and on the ground, among an untidy litter of plunder...
-The Hobbit

name: Eomer
text: Response: After a character leaves play, Éomer gets +2 Attack until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: `I am named Éomer son of Éomund, and am called the Third Marshal of Riddermark.` -The Two Towers

name: Grima
text: Action: Lower the cost of the next card you play from your hand this round by 1. That card gains Doomed 1. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: `Let your counsellor Gríma keep all things till your return - and I pray that we may see it, though no wise man will deem it hopeful.` -The Two Towers

name: Saruman
text:
Doomed 3.
At the end of the round, discard Saruman from play.

Response: After Saruman enters play, choose a non-unique enemy or location in the staging area. While Saruman is in play, the chosen enemy or location is considered to be out of play.

name: Orthanc Guard
text: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, ready Orthanc Guard.
flavor: `...the keepers of the gate were on the watch for me and told me that Saruman awaited me.` -Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Isengard Messenger
text: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, Isengard Messenger gets +1 Willpower until the end of the round. (Limit twice per round.)
flavor: `I have an urgent errand,` he said. `My news is evil.` -Radagast, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Westfold Outrider
text: Action: Discard Westfold Outrider to choose an enemy not engaged with you. Engage the chosen enemy.
flavor: `Erkenbrand of Westfold has drawn off those men he could gather towards his fastness at Helm's Deep. The rest are scattered.`-Rider of Rohan, The Two Towers

name: Westfold Horse-breeder
text: Response: After Westfold Horse-breeder enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Mount attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: `They love their horses next to their kin.` -Boromir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Rohan Warhorse
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Tactics or Rohan hero.
Response: After attached hero participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, exhaust Rohan Warhorse to ready attached hero.
flavor: Their horses were of great stature, strong and clean-limbed... -The Two Towers

name: Silver Lamp
text:
Attach to a Spirit hero.
While attached hero is ready, shadow cards dealt to enemies engaged with you are dealt face up. (Shadow card effects are still resolved when resolving enemy attacks.)
flavor: ...one of them uncovered a small lamp that gave out a slender silver beam. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Keys of Orthanc
text:
Attach to a hero.
Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, exhaust Keys of Othanc to add 1 resource to attached hero's resource pool.
flavor: `He has the Key of Orthanc` -Gandalf, The Two Towers

name: Legacy of Numenor
text:
Doomed 4.
Action: Add 1 resource to each hero's resource pool.
flavor: `...in the midst of that valley is a tower of stone called Orthanc. It was not made by Saruman, but by the Men of Númenor long ago: and it is very tall and has many secrets...` -Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Deep Knowledge
text:
Doomed 2.
Action: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavor: `His knowledge is deep, but his pride has grown with it...` -Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: The Wizard's Voice
text:
Doomed 3.
Action: Each player chooses 1 enemy engaged with him. Until the end of the phase, each chosen enemy cannot attack the player that chose it.
flavor: ...it was a delight to hear the voice speaking, all that it said seemed wise and reasonable... -The Two Towers

name: Power of Orthanc
text:
Doomed 2.
Action: Each player may choose and discard a Condition attachment from play.
flavor: `But Saruman has long studied the arts of the Enemy himself, and thus we have often been able to forestall him.` -Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: The Seeing-stone
text:
Doomed 1.
Action: Search your deck for a card with the Doomed keyword and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: `...alone it could do nothing but see small images of things far off and days remote.` -Gandalf, The Two Towers

name: Celeborn
text: Response: After a Silvan ally enters play, that ally gets +1 Willpower, +1 Attack and +1 Defense until the end of the round.
flavor: `...the lord of the Galadhrim is accounted wisest of the Elves of Middle-earth, and a giver of gifts beyond the power of kings.` -Galadriel, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Naith Guide
text: Response: After Naith Guide enters play, choose a hero. That hero does not exhaust to quest this round.
flavor: `...I shall lead you well...` -Haldir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Swift and Silent
text: Action: Ready a hero you control. Then, if your threat is 20 or less and this is the first time you played a copy of Swift and Silent this round, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.
flavor: A marching host of Elves had come up silently...–The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Firefoot
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Tactics or Rohan hero.
Attached hero gets +1 Attack (+2 Attack instead if attached hero is Éomer).
Response: After attached hero attacks alone, exhaust Firefoot to choose a non-unique enemy engaged with you. Excess damage dealt by this attack is assigned to the chosen enemy.

name: Close Call
text:
Doomed X.
Response: Cancel X damage just dealt to a hero.
flavor: `That spear-thrust would have skewered a wild boar!`–Aragorn, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Blue Mountain Trader
text: Action: Choose another player. That player gains control of Blue Mountain Trader. Then, that player moves 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero he controls to the resource pool of a hero you control, or Blue Mountain Trader is discarded.

name: The Fall of Gil-galad
text:
Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a hero.
Response: When attached hero is destroyed, add The Fall of Gil-galad to the victory display to reduce your threat by X, where X is the attached hero's threat cost.
flavor:
...for into darkness fell his star
in Mordor where the shadows are.
–The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Ithilien Lookout
text:
Secrecy 2.
Response: After Ithilien Lookout enters play, look at the top card of the encounter deck. If it is an enemy, you may discard it.
flavor: All had swords at their sides... –The Two Towers

name: The Tree People
text: Action: Return a Silvan ally you control to your hand to search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Silvan ally. Put that ally into play and shuffle the other cards back into your deck. You can only play 1 copy of The Tree People each phase.
flavor: No folk could they see, nor hear any feet upon the paths; but there were many voices, about them, and in the air above. –The Fellowship of the Ring

name: The White Council
text:
X is the number of players in the game.

Action: Starting with the first player, each player chooses 1 different option: ready a hero he controls, add 1 resource to the resource pool of
a hero he controls, draw 1 card, or shuffle 1 card from his discard pile into his deck.
flavor:
`I it was who first summoned the White Council.`
–Galadriel, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Idraen
text: Response: After a location is explored, ready Idraen.
flavor: `Where now are the Dúnedain, Elessar, Elessar? Why do thy kinsfolk wander afar?` -Galadriel, The Two Towers

name: Rivendell Scout
text: Secrecy 2.
flavor: `Elrond is sending Elves, and they will get in touch with the Rangers, and maybe with Thranduil's folk in Mirkwood.` -Gandalf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Feigned Voices
text: Combat Action: Return a Silvan ally you control to your hand to choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.
flavor: `The three of us could not challenge a hundred, so we went ahead and spoke with feigned voices, leading them on into the wood.` -Haldir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Rumil
text:
Ranged.
Response: After you play Rúmil from your hand, choose an enemy engaged with a player. Deal X damage to that enemy where X is the number of ranged characters you control.
flavor: ...the Company set out again, guided now by Haldir and his brother Rúmil. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Elven Mail
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character.
Attached character gets +2 hit points and gains sentinel.
flavor: ...they were tall and and clad in grey mail, and from their shoulders hung long white cloaks. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Greyflood Wanderer
text: You may give Greyflood Wanderer doomed 2 when you play from your hand. If you do, it gains: `Response: After you play Greyflood Wanderer, place 1 progress token on each location in play.`
flavor: ...others had gone west, and with the help of Aragorn and the Rangers had searched the lands far down the Greyflood... -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Warden of Arnor
text:
Attach to a Scout hero.
While attached character is committed to the quest, place 1 progress on the first location revealed by the encounter deck each round.
flavor: `I have had a hard life and a long: and the leagues that lie between here and Gondor are a small part in the count of my journeys.` -Aragorn, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Message from Elrond
text: Action: Choose a player. That player may choose 1 card from his hand and add it to another player's hand. At the end of the round, if the chosen card is in that player's hand or in play, shuffle it into its owner's deck.
flavor: `But we have heard rumours of your coming, for the messengers of Elrond passed by Lórien on the way home up the Dimrill Stair. -Haldir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Noiseless Movement
text: Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. That enemy does not make engagement checks this round. Then, if your threat is 20 or less and this is the first time you played a copy of Noiseless Movement this round, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.
flavor: ...the woodland folk were altogether noiseless in their movements. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Leaf Brooch
text:
Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero.
The first event card you play each round that matches attached hero's printed sphere gains secrecy 1.
flavor: Each cloak was fastened about the neck with a brooch like a green leaf veined with silver. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Haldir of Lorien
text:
Ranged.
Combat Action: If you have not engaged an enemy this round, exhaust Haldir of Lórien to declare him as an attacker (and resolve his attack) against an enemy not engaged with you. Limit once per round.
flavor: `We allow no strangers to spy out the secrets of the Naith...` -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Herald of Anorien
text: You may give Herald of Anórien doomed 2 when you play it from your hand. If you do, it gains: `Response: After you play Herald of Anórien, choose a player. That player may put into play 1 ally from his hand with a printed cost 2 or lower.`
flavor: `Send the heralds forth! Let them summon all who dwell nigh!` -Théoden, The Two Towers

name: O Lorien
text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust O Lorien! to lower the cost of the next Silvan ally played this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
flavor:
`I sang of leaves, of leaves of gold, and
leaves of gold there grew:
Of wind I sang, a wind there came and in the
branches blew.` -Galadriel, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Gwaihir
text:
Cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After Gwaihir enters play, search your discard pile for an Eagle ally and put it into play under your control. At the end of the round, if that ally is still in play, add it to your hand.
flavor: `The North Wind blows, but we shall outfly it.` -Gwaihir, The Return of the King

name: Pursuing the Enemy
text: Action: Return a Silvan ally you control to your hand to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.
flavor: The marauding orcs had been waylaid and almost all destroyed; the remnant had fled westward towards the mountains, and were being pursued. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Courage Awakened
text: Action: Choose a hero. That hero gets +2 Willpower until the end of the phase. Then, if your threat is 20 or less and this is the first time you played a copy of Courage Awakened this round, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.
flavor: But the courage that had been awakened in him was now too strong: he could not leave his friends so easily. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Free to Choose
text: Response: After your threat is raised by an encounter card effect, reduce your threat by an equal amount.
flavor: Suddenly he was aware of himself again. Frodo, neither the Voice nor the Eye; free to choose, and with one remaining instant in which to do so. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Galadhrim Minstrel
text: Response: After Galadhrim Minstrel enters play, search the top five cards of your deck for an event card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
flavor: ...the language was that of Elven-song and spoke of things little known on Middle-earth. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Lembas
text:
Play only if you control a Noldor or Silvan hero. Attach to a hero.
Action: Discard Lembas to ready attached hero and heal 3 damage from it.
flavor: `...it is more strengthing than any food made by Men, and it is more pleasant than cram, by all accounts. -Lórien Elf, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Defender of the Naith
text:
Sentinel.
Response: After a Silvan ally you control leaves play, ready Defender of the Naith.
flavor: `We have been keeping watch on the rivers, ever since we saw a great troop of Orcs going North toward Moria...` -Haldir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Mablung
text: Response: After you engage an enemy, add 1 resource to Mablung's resource pool. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor:
But the Captains of the West were well warned by their scouts, skilled men from Henneth Annûn led by Mablung...
-The Return of the King

name: Follow Me!
text: Action: Take control of the first player token and draw 1 card.
flavor:
`Come! I will lead you now!`
-Aragorn, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Tighten Our Belts
text: Refresh Action: Choose a player. Each hero that player controls that did not spend any resources this round gains 1 resource. Only 1 copy of Tighten Our Belts can be played by the players each round.
flavor: There was nothing now to be done but to tighten the belts round their empty stomachs, and hoist their empty sacks and packs... -The Hobbit

name: Galadhon Archer
text:
Ranged.
Response: After Galadhon Archer enters play, deal 1 damage to an enemy not engaged with you.
flavor: `...they say that you breathe so loud that they could shoot you in the dark.` -Legolas, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Bow of the Galadhrim
text:
Restricted.
Attach to a Silvan character with the ranged keyword.
Attached character gets +1 Attack. (+2 Attack instead if attacking an enemy not engaged with you.)
flavor: ...longer and stronger than the bows of Mirkwood, and strung with a string of elf-hair. -The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Celduin Traveler
text:
Secrecy 2.
Response: After Celduin Traveler enters play, look at the top card of the encounter deck. If it is a location, you may discard it.
flavor: In two days going they rowed right up the Long Lake and passed out into the River Running... -The Hobbit

name: Island Amid Perils
text: Action: Return a Silvan you control to your hand to reduce your threat by X where X is the printed cost of the ally returned to your hand.
flavor:
`...we dare not by our own trust endanger our land. We live now upon an island amid many perils...` 
-Haldir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Mirkwood Pioneer
text: You may give Mirkwood Pioneer doomed 1 when you play it from your hand. If you do it gains: `Response: After you play Mirkwood Pioneer, choose a card in the staging area. Until the end of the round, the chosen card does not contribute its Threat.`

name: Wingfoot
text:
Attach to a Ranger hero.
Response: After attached hero commits to a quest. name enemy, location or treachery. If a card of the named type is revealed during this quest phase, ready attached hero.
flavor:
`Wingfoot I name you. This deed of the three friends should be sung in many a hall. Forty leagues and five you have measured ere the forth day is ended!`
-Éomer, The Two Towers

name: Defender of the West
text:
Attach to a non-objective unique ally in play.
The first player gains control of attached ally.
Damage from undefended attacks against you may be assigned to attached ally.
flavor:
`...if by life or death I can save you, I will.`
-Aragorn, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Galadriel
text:
Galadriel cannot quest, attack, or defend. Allies you control do not exhaust to commit to the quest during the round they enter play.

Action: Exhaust Galadriel to choose a player. That player reduces his threat by 1 and draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Heir of Mardil
text:
Attach to a Noble hero.

Response: After attached hero gains any number of resources from a card effect, exhaust Heir of Mardil to ready attached hero.
flavor:
`...in my turn I bore it, and so did each eldest son of our house, far back into the vanished years before the failing of the kings...`
-Denethor, The Return of the King

name: Orophin
text:
Ranged.
Response: After Orophin enters play, return a Silvan ally from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: `Orophin has now gone in haste back to our dwellings to warn our people.` -Haldir, The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Henneth Annun Guard
text: You may give Henneth Annûn Guard doomed 1 when you play it from your hand. If you do, it gains :`Response: After you play Henneth Annûn Guard, choose a character. Until the end of the round, that character gets +2 Defense and gains sentinel.`
flavor: `Does he think that men sleep without watch all night?` -Faramir, The Two Towers

name: Charge of the Rohirrim
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each Rohan character with a Mount attachment gets +3 Attack.
